title: Curatio
description:
Filter your SMS messages using the latest innovations on AI:

- Curatio categorize every new SMS message without any previous instructions.
- Curatio filter every SMS message you receive as Transactional, Promotional or Spam.
- Transactional messages are categorized by Carrier, Orders, Health & Public Services.
- Get only two-factor authentication codes (optional)
- Send all promotional messages to Junk (optional)
